      • setSpeeds

        public static void setSpeeds(int lSpd,
             int rSpd)
        Turns the left and right motors at the specified speeds
        Parameters:
        lSpd - the speed of the left motor
        rSpd - the speed of the right motor

      • stopMotors

        public static void stopMotors()
        Halts the motors

      • goForward

        public void goForward(float distance,
             int speed)
        Makes the robots advance or back up by a distance at a specified speed
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance (in cm) to travel
        speed - the speed of the wheels

      • setWifiInfo

        public void setWifiInfo()
        Gets the competition information provided by WiFi and stores it into fields
        See Also:
        WifiConnection

      • startOdometer

        public void startOdometer()
        Sets up the odometer thread
        See Also:
        Odometer

      • isTimeShort

        public boolean isTimeShort()
        Calculates the remaining time and returns if there is enough time to continue the routine
        Returns:
        true if the time is almost up, otherwise returns false

      • jobAssigned

        public boolean jobAssigned()
        Reads the BTN and CTN and returns the robots job for the heat
        Returns:
        true if the robot is a builder or false if it is a collector

      • goToStart

        public void goToStart()
        Moves the robot to the starting corner

        public void timedOut()
